pullRequest.title: Let Http2ConnectionHandler close stream with voidPromise
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
Http2ConnectionHandler tries to addListener to the future without checking if it's void. If it is void, this will fail and generate an exception.
Modifications:
Unvoid the promise before attempting to write
Result:
Fixes #10816
Writing with a voidPromise no longer generates exceptions.

commit.message:
Let Http2ConnectionHandler close stream with voidPromise

Motivation:

Http2ConnectionHandler tries to addListener to the future without checking if it's void. If it is void, this will fail and generate an exception. 
 
Modifications:

Get a new promise from the future's channel if the future is void.
 
Result:

Fixes #10816
Writing with a voidPromise no longer generates exceptions.
